textBeforeTable: DEATHS EXTRACTED FROM THE 'NEW ZEALAND HERALD' - 1993 OLD NEWS BIOS - NEW ZEALAND. NEW ZEALAND DEATH NOTICES. There are also good collections at: I will be adding more Te Puke death notices to this collection as time goes on - if you would like to send me any from your own collections I would be most pleased to receive them. Last updated: Tuesday 29 September 2009 These death notices were pasted into scrapbooks by Mrs Jean Barnett who lived in Te Puke all her life. She was the "original genealogist" and kept notices and obituaries not only for Te Puke and ex-Te Puke residents but for known relations. These cover mostly the period from the 1940s to the 1960s, though there are entries for either side of this. Thanks to Val Gibbons for allowing these to be made available to all.
